body:
A minute ago my rep dropped from 1200 to 940. All my posts and everyone else's posts and comments from the last day or two are now gone. A post I kicked into +general is now back where it originally was. I had also deleted it and it became undeleted. There are no new posts at all for at least a day. And I received new messages in my inbox for comment replies which already came through several days ago.

Did Ruqqus just have to restore from a backup?

Edit: Everything appears to be restored now.
body_html:
A minute ago my rep dropped from 1200 to 940. All my posts and everyone else's posts and comments from the last day or two are now gone. A post I kicked into +general is now back where it originally was. I had also deleted it and it became undeleted. There are no new posts at all for at least a day. And I received new messages in my inbox for comment replies which already came through several days ago.

Did Ruqqus just have to restore from a backup?

Edit: Everything appears to be restored now.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

title: Did Ruqqus just have a hard drive crash?

body: Dev mistake, apparently. Made a change that didn't work out and had to revert.

body: Tried a database thing. It didn't work (as you noticed) so I reverted everything. No data was lost, or even at risk of being lost.
body_html: Tried a database thing. It didn't work (as you noticed) so I reverted everything. No data was lost, or even at risk of being lost.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

parent.body: Tried a database thing. It didn't work (as you noticed) so I reverted everything. No data was lost, or even at risk of being lost.
parent.body_html: Tried a database thing. It didn't work (as you noticed) so I reverted everything. No data was lost, or even at risk of being lost.

post.body:
A minute ago my rep dropped from 1200 to 940. All my posts and everyone else's posts and comments from the last day or two are now gone. A post I kicked into +general is now back where it originally was. I had also deleted it and it became undeleted. There are no new posts at all for at least a day. And I received new messages in my inbox for comment replies which already came through several days ago.

Did Ruqqus just have to restore from a backup?

Edit: Everything appears to be restored now.
post.body_html:
A minute ago my rep dropped from 1200 to 940. All my posts and everyone else's posts and comments from the last day or two are now gone. A post I kicked into +general is now back where it originally was. I had also deleted it and it became undeleted. There are no new posts at all for at least a day. And I received new messages in my inbox for comment replies which already came through several days ago.

Did Ruqqus just have to restore from a backup?

Edit: Everything appears to be restored now.
post.title: Did Ruqqus just have a hard drive crash?
